Was in interested in Connector. Referred to us her client at the city of Sydney (Kat). They are a signage company that has been around for 30yrs. Last year when she started she said the company was all about having an emphasis on existing clients. Now they have gone to much more of a new business revenue focus. They have clients like fairfax, city of sydney. Have reps in Syd, Mel, and Qld, and possibly even WA. They have an annual new business budget they havent hit despite working on a financial year in money allocated. gave me cameron's details who reports direct to big wig at the company. Calling Cameron. Key trigger to them are listed as things like upcoming events, media events, rebrandings!!!, change that leads to need to market themselves.
Cameron left the office already, left a message for a call back
Asked me to call him back in July was a very friendly man.
Sent LI.
Called Cameron. Left message and emailed. Asking for a meeting and that we can help along with a lead attached....... If no response then give MD Marc a crack (also owner by the looks of last name)

Called to see if the Brisbane Olympics tender lead was of interest. He said it was super helpful and that Aron hasn't discussed his meeting with me yet.  Said they don't have the resources for new biz - highlighted how we can help with their lapsed clients.  Is going to speak to them both and come back to me.Hi Marc,Great to speak earlier - good to know that the Brisbane Olympics lead was of value - plenty more like that!  Keep me posted on how you go and if you need additional contacts.As discussed, I met with Aron a couple of months ago to demo Prospector - he can definitely see value in our platform.I've also had numerous meetings with Chris and he also is a fan of our value proposition.In addition to the obvious new business opportunities we can provide they both agreed being able to qualify lapsed clients through our platform would be a huge time saver and enable them to target those that are worth reengaging with.QUOTE for two licences - to accept, just click on the link and accept.We'd love to work with Selby's again. I'm confident we can streamline your outreach, improve productivity and generate more revenue for you.Cheers,

Hi MarcNice speaking with you yesterday and great to pick up where I left off with Adrian.Prospector is a lead gen tool that has been around for 20 years.Â  Since its inception we have generated over $1 billion in incremental sales for our clients.Â  We do this by giving you a valid business reason to engage a prospect at a time when they will be considering upcoming corporate, advertising and marketing spend.Â  Each sales opportunity is handpicked by our research team and includes senior decision maker contacts.Our database currently holds 250,000 active contacts, 80,000 active companiesÂ and we publish approximately 150 insights (leads) per day.A 12 month subscription for one licence is normally $7,000.Â  In response to COVID we've modified our platform to offer Prospector Lite - fully automated and sits on our website at $280+gst per month or $3,000+gst up front.Â  This is a short term offering and a great opportunity to lock in the heavily discounted rate for a 12 month period.I've attached a copy of our brochure and below is a cross section of the types of leads we can generate and data we can supply for Selbys.Â  The screenshots below show a cross section of searches including insight search (business activity that gives you the valid business reason to engage), contacts and companies.  Look forward to hearing your thoughts and discussing further.
MG SW Marc.  Has a vague idea of what the tool is about from Adrian before he left.  Wants info and pricing for PL
Adrian McBean finishing up 25/8.  Sent LI request to discuss further.
Sent LI.

"Hi xxx,

I hope my email finds you well.

The reason for my email is I would like to catch up with you to discuss how Connector can add value to the way that you currently approach account management and pitching for new clients at xxx.

Wouldnâ€™t you love to be updated daily on what companies are likely to go to pitch in the next few months? Do you feel it is essential to be prepared before talking to an organisation â€“ with information including organisational growth and marketing changes, key contacts at the organisation, and what agency relationships they currently have? If you answer yes to the above â€“ Connector is the tool for you.

Coming into the end of the FY I am sure that you are planning your strategy on how to get more share of wallet out of existing clients, and also preparing a strategy around the type of client(s) you would like to win. I would love to show you how Connector can save you thousands of man hours, and of course dollars to help you achieve this.

I am sure you are wondering at what expense this will be â€“ So I can tell you we have Connector packages starting from $526+GST per month.

Please touch base with me directly. I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,

Kristie
"
NFY2017

subct_SUBDLG omitNoMsg.subct_SUBDLG omitNoMsg::Dialogue: FH sent an email asking if he has been able to discuss arranging a presentation with his new SM and MD, told him I was happy to get in touch with them myself to arrange a time if he was to pass on their details- WIll call MD myself if Gary goes not get back to me
Fh sent email to Gary as the new SM should have now started, asked him to put me in touch with the new Sales Manager and MD to organise a go2meeting session to present Prospector to them

Fh called and spoke with Gary he said that he as passed on the prop and all the info to Mark however he has not heard back from him yet. he said they have a new Sales Manager starting on the 1st of May and he may be waiting for him to start so they can evaluate. He does not have much more for me, told him I will call him early May if I do not hear back sooner
FH called and left msg with Receptionist to followup next steps

FH conducted phone meeting with Gary. He said they are in the process of hiring a new Sales Manager to oversee sales nation wide, He said they are looking at becoming more proactive rather than reactive and taking orders. They work on a project by project basis, and do not have any retainers as such booked and therefore want to put a heavy focus on relationship building and identifying opportunities through current clients and new companies within the mid-large tier. Their biggest client is McDonald's which is worth $150k-200k. They have 5 Sales reps in VIC, 1 in NSW, 1 in QLD, and 1 in Perth. Head office is VIC where Marc Selby the MD is based.They can target any industry who are looking to do some sort of outdoor, events advertising. Retailers and new stores/expansions are also good for them. 60% of their work is with clients direct and 40% are with agency affiliates such as sampling/event/outdoor agencies etc. All the opportunities I showed him were a great fit, and companies they are looking to work with or win from competitors such as Myer.He thinks it is a great tool, and thinks that it will assist with making the reps more proactive. he agreed they have to discuss and implement a better outbound strategy. and that the subscription needs to be managed to ensure all users are maximising the full potential of the service. Told him I will send a prop (which I have now done), for him to discuss with Marc, and he mentioned it would probably be beneficial to set up a go2meeting with Marc also for a presentation, He may look at having one license which they then feed to reps, told him if they wanted to go forward this month I would be happy to include extra FOC licences.

FH rec inbound from Gary who is based in QLD. He looks after Marketing as well as BDM for QLD. He typed in out of home buyers in Google and that is how he came across Prospector. Booked phone preso for 17/04 he said he will then discuss after this with MD Marc and acting Sales Manager.
Received reply - he'll speak to Marc - leave it with him.  Hopefully will fuel him to actually speak to his boss because I doubt he has.  Not going to contact again - will wait to hear from him.

Adrian is ghosting me so sent the following - Marc is the boss.  Hi AdrianHope you're keeping safe down there.  Would you mind if I gave Marc a call to discuss Prospector?  Keep getting all of these great leads through and thought it may help to run through the value of our tool with him. Kind regards
MG LM - just checking in to see how things are going.  Asked for CB.

Usually around $7,000 per year so hoping you're able to take advantage of the offer so you can lock in the discounted price for 12 months.Look forward to hearing from you one way or the other so I can put this to bed if it's not going to work out.Kind regardsMichele
